title: Märchen Mädchen (Maerchen Maedchen)
synopsis: Hazuki Kagimura is a socially awkward girl with no friends; and having been recently adopted, she struggles to connect with her new family as well. Her only refuge from this painful reality is between the pages of stories where her vivid imagination allows her to live out her dreams of friendship and adventure. However, one day, an old and mysterious text appears in her book bag. On her way back to the library to return it, Hazuki sees a familiar girl who is seemingly invisible to everyone but her. Deciding to follow her, Hazuki is led a hidden library where a world she thought only existed in her dreams awaits her.
characters: ['Kagimura, Hazuki', 'Qazan, Yumilia', 'Tsuchimikado, Shizuka', 'Kasumi, Ariko', 'Arier, Agathe', 'Sadohara, Mai', 'Boyarskii, Tatiana', 'Mahakali', 'Upierzyca', 'Rasputin, Maria']
